2019 loka kusalana krikat tharagawaliya engalanthaye ha welsaye pawathwime sathkaraka ekangathawata jagath krikat kawunsalaya (ayi.si.si.) ha engalantha krikat mandalaya assan kara thibe.2019 wasare juni masaya pura kridangana 10ka tharagawaliya pawathwenu athi athara danata thibena thaththwaya anuwa mita kandayam 10k sahabhagi wanu atha.“me ekangathawata assan kirima nisa loka kusalana tharaga pawathwimata kamaththak dakwana kridangana samaga giwisumwalata elambaimata engalantha krikat mandalayata awasthawa labenawa” yayi ema mandalaye pradhana widhayaka dewid koliyar prakasha kaleya.tharagawali adhyaksha stiw elwarthige nayakathwayen yuth 2013 champiyans kusalana sanwidhayaka kandayama juni 23 wanida ema tharagawaliya awasan wu wahama 2019 loka kusalana tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wime wada katayuthu aarambha karanu athayida koliyar pawasiya.engalanthaya 1999 loka kusalanayata sathkarakathwaya daruwada owunge kandayama mulika watayedima tharagawaliyen iwathata wisi wiya. 2004 champiyans kusalana ha 2009 dewani wissayi 20 loka kusalana tharagawali pawathwuneda engalanthayeya.loka kusalana tharaga laba ganima pinisa awama washayen krikat samaja 11k uthsaha karanu athayi apeksha kere. em.si.si., sare, notinhamshayar, workshayar, hampshayar, darham, lankashayar, yokshayar, glamargan, glosestarshayar ha samarset ema samaja wethi..
